entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: Watto isn't one for charity. You helped him get some stolen property back so he would help you find the lost droid parts.
entries.journal_entry_description: Watto can help you with the droid, but he needs you to collect some speeder parts that were never paid for.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Watto said he would help you if you would take care of some thieves first.
entries.task00_journal_entry_title: Kill Thieves and Recover Watto's Parts
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Return to Watto with his stolen parts.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Good Work! You have completed the Watto's Bargain quest.
